org.apache.tephra.persist

Interface TransactionStateStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTransactionStateStorage, HDFSTransactionStateStorage, LocalFileTransactionStateStorage, NoOpTransactionStateStorage

    public interface TransactionStateStorage
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    Defines the common contract for persisting transaction state changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

      • writeSnapshot

        void writeSnapshot(OutputStream out,
                 TransactionSnapshot snapshot)
                   throws IOException
        Persists a snapshot of transaction state to an output stream.

        IOException

      • writeSnapshot

        void writeSnapshot(TransactionSnapshot snapshot)
                   throws IOException
        Persists a snapshot of transaction state.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getLatestSnapshot

        TransactionSnapshot getLatestSnapshot()
                                      throws IOException
        Returns the most recent snapshot that has been successfully written. Note that this may return null if no completed snapshot files are found.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getLatestTransactionVisibilityState

        TransactionVisibilityState getLatestTransactionVisibilityState()
                                                               throws IOException
        Returns the most recent transaction visibility state that has been successfully written. Note that this may return null if no completed snapshot files are found.
        Returns:
        TransactionVisibilityState
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deleteOldSnapshots

        long deleteOldSnapshots(int numberToKeep)
                        throws IOException
        Removes any snapshots prior to the numberToKeep most recent.
        Parameters:
        numberToKeep - The number of most recent snapshots to keep.
        Returns:
        The timestamp of the oldest snapshot kept.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while deleting old snapshots.

      • listSnapshots

        List<String> listSnapshots()
                           throws IOException
        Returns the (non-qualified) names of available snapshots.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getLogsSince

        List<TransactionLog> getLogsSince(long timestamp)
                                  throws IOException
        Returns all TransactionLogs with a timestamp greater than or equal to the given timestamp. Note that the returned list is guaranteed to be sorted in ascending timestamp order.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createLog

        TransactionLog createLog(long timestamp)
                         throws IOException
        Creates a new TransactionLog.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • listLogs

        List<String> listLogs()
                      throws IOException
        Returns the (non-qualified) names of available logs.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deleteLogsOlderThan

        void deleteLogsOlderThan(long timestamp)
                         throws IOException
        Removes any transaction logs with a timestamp older than the given value. Logs must be removed based on timestamp to ensure we can fully recover state based on a given snapshot.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The timestamp to delete up to. Logs with a timestamp less than this value will be removed.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while removing logs.

      • setupStorage

        void setupStorage()
                  throws IOException
        Create the directories required for the transaction state stage.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurred during the creation of required directories for transaction state storage.

      • getLocation

        String getLocation()
        Returns a string representation of the location used for persistence.
